title: The Y Chromosome
description: Prize winning novelist and poet Leona Gom challenges the reader to meet an all-women society of the future. She examines the relations and value system of a culture of women where the few men still alive are in hiding, socialized early in life to regard themselves as inferior. The Y Chromosome a provocative novel that probes women's and men's lives in a society that, despite striking differences, bears many similarities to our world today.
author: Leona Gom
